title: How do I view the battery usage status?
answer:
For phones using EMUI 2.3 or below, go to Settings and then select Battery to view the remaining battery level, the battery usage time and the battery consumption data for system software and hardware. 

 For phones using EMUI 3.0, go to Settings and then select Power saving. Switch to the Power saving tab to view the remaining battery level and the remaining usage time.
